author: Don Steinberg
title: Ben Kingsley Humanizes the Inhumane in ‘An Ordinary Man’
text:
Ben Kingsley and Brad Silberling didn’t agonize over the decision to humanize a character accused of horrible atrocities. It was their objective in “An Ordinary Man.” 
The film, which opens later this week, is loosely based on the later years of Ratko Mladic, the Bosnian Serb general known as “The Butcher of Bosnia” who was sentenced last year to life in prison after being found guilty of genocide, crimes against humanity and war crimes during the Bosnian war. 
...
